vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φωτ-ισμός, ὁ,
illumination, light, Diocl(?).cited in [Refs 1st c.AD+]

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
light, illumination
illumination; a shining forth, bringing to light, enlightenment, 2Cor. 4:4, 6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: luz, iluminación ; revelación, sacar a la luz
